FlagUtilities
public static
Ultraleap.​TouchFree.​Tooling.​FlagUtilities

A collection of Utilities to be used when working with BitmaskFlags.

Functions
GetInteractionFlags
internal static BitmaskFlags GetInteractionFlags(
InteractionType _interactionType,
HandType _handType,
HandChirality _chirality,
InputType _inputType
)

Used to convert a collection of interaction enums to flags for sending to the Service.

GetChiralityFromFlags
internal static HandChirality GetChiralityFromFlags(
BitmaskFlags _flags
)

Used to find which HandChirality _flags contains. Favours RIGHT if none or both are found.

GetHandTypeFromFlags
internal static HandType GetHandTypeFromFlags(
BitmaskFlags _flags
)

Used to find which HandType _flags contains. Favours PRIMARY if none or both are found.

GetInputTypeFromFlags
internal static InputType GetInputTypeFromFlags(
BitmaskFlags _flags
)

Used to find which InputType _flags contains. Favours NONE if none are found.

GetInteractionTypeFromFlags
internal static InteractionType GetInteractionTypeFromFlags(
BitmaskFlags _flags
)

Used to find which InteractionType _flags contains. Favours PUSH if none are found.
